message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
You're not giving me enough in your first offer, I'll try to do better
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go too far!
You're getting closer, but I want a bit more
I'll meet you in the middle, but don't expect me to give up too much more!
I'm getting closer to what I want, but I'll still consider a good deal
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'll give you a bit more
